## SmithyLambdaIntegrationProps.credentialsRole property

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

IAM Role API Gateway should use to invoke the Lambda. If left undefined the integration will generated default permissions when bound to an API path.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly credentialsRole?: iam.IRole;
```
